body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

On the the Cray system Spock building phist like
`spack install phist@1.9.4%gcc@10.3.0`
Fails with:
```
     973      389 |       call MPI_Allreduce(MPI_IN_PLACE,ierr,1,MPI_INTEGER,MPI_MAX,map1%comm,mpi_ierr)
     974          |                         2
  >> 975    Error: Type mismatch between actual argument at (1) and actual argument at (2) (LOGICAL(4)/INTEGER(4)).
  >> 976    make[2]: *** [CMakeFiles/phist_kernels_builtin.dir/build.make:185: CMakeFiles/phist_kernels_builtin.dir/src/kernels/builtin/map_module.F90.o] Error 1
```


### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.2-4271-c4e26ac7c8
* **Python:** 3.6.13
* **Platform:** cray-sles15-zen2
* **Concretizer:** clingo


### Additional information

[spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7180299/spack-build-out.txt)
[spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/7180303/spack-build-env.txt)
@jthies

### General information

- [X] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [X] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and **@mentioned** any maintainers
- [X] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [X] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: phist
